programme.title: Scary Movie 2, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: >Scary Movie 2, (2001, Comedy)

programme.title: Friday the 13th, (1980, Horror)
programme.desc: Remake finds university students joining a young man searching for his missing sister at Camp Crystal Lake, home of machete-wielding, hockey-masked Jason.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VII -- The New Blood, (1988, Horror)
programme.desc: A woman with telekinetic powers accidentally revives a serial killer who goes on a murderous rampage. She then tries to use her special powers to bring his reign of terror to an end.

programme.title: Son of the Pink Panther, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: The eighth and last of the Pink Panther series. The illegitimate son of Inspector Clouseau is on the case of the kidnapped Princess Yasmin.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World, (2010, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Twenty-two-year-old slacker Scott Pilgrim meets Ramona Flowers, the girl of his dreams, and learns that in order to win her heart hell have to defeat her seven evil exes in a series of video-game-styled battles.

programme.title: Barely Lethal, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: A teenager who has been trained since childhood to be a special-ops assassin meets her biggest challenge yet when she tries to navigate ordinary high-school life.

programme.title: Revenge of the Pink Panther, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: A bumbling detective dons a series of disguises to apprehend drug racketeers. Hes assisted by the ex-girlfriend of the groups kingpin.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, (1980, Horror)
programme.desc: Remake finds university students joining a young man searching for his missing sister at Camp Crystal Lake, home of machete-wielding, hockey-masked Jason.

programme.title: Mojave, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A depressed actor goes to the Mojave Desert to get away from everything, but once there he runs into a sociopathic drifter. Later, the accidental murder of a police officer leads to the two men getting caught up in a game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan, (1989, Horror)
programme.desc: A boat full of high-school seniors on their class trip are systematically stalked and murdered by serial killer Jason Vorhees, with the last group of survivors being chased through the streets of Manhattan.

programme.title: Ingrid Goes West, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: An emotionally unbalanced woman named Ingrid becomes obsessed with a social-media celebrity, and impulsively moves to Los Angeles in order to befriend her. Unsurprisingly, Ingrids attempts to bond with the woman end up backfiring.

programme.title: Friday the 13th---Part III, (1982, Horror)
programme.desc: The creepy killer takes out a store-owner couple, then travels to the lake to prey on a girl who had a previous encounter with him.

programme.title: Friday the 13th---A New Beginning, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: A Jason Voorhees copycat stalks a home for disturbed youths, where Tommy Jarvis has gone to recover in the wake of his harrowing encounter with the hockey-masked killer.

programme.title: Revenge of the Green Dragons, (2014, Crime drama)
programme.desc: Two immigrant brothers join a Chinatown gang called the Green Dragons in the 1980s, and draw the attention of two hard-nosed detectives while rising to power in the New York underworld. Later, the siblings clash, sending one on a mission of vengeance.

programme.title: Mojave, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A depressed actor goes to the Mojave Desert to get away from everything, but once there he runs into a sociopathic drifter. Later, the accidental murder of a police officer leads to the two men getting caught up in a game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: The Square, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: Christian, the curator of an art museum in Stockholm, finds his life spinning out of control after he decides to hunt down the thieves who stole his cell phone and wallet. Meanwhile, his museum hosts an exhibit about kindness in everyday life, but it soon goes off the rails as well.

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: The staff and visitors of the Taj Mahal Palace Hotel struggle to deal with the 2008 Mumbai attacks. Over the course of a few days, they try to survive an encounter with Pakistani terrorists who are each armed with high-end weapons and explosives.

programme.title: The Pink Panther, (1963, Comedy)
programme.desc: The prequel to the 1964 comic gem of the same name stars Steve Martin as hapless Inspector Clouseau, investigating murder and the theft of a priceless jewel.

programme.title: The Fluffy Movie, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Gabriel "Fluffy" Iglesias performs his hilarious brand of family-friendly stand-up comedy in this concert film captured during his Unity Through Laughter Tour.

programme.title: Genius, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: This sparkling biopic of literary editor Max Perkins centers on his personal and professional relationship with eccentric author Thomas Wolfe. As Wolfe becomes consumed with his lengthy novels, Perkins struggles to reel in his talent in order to deliver another best-seller for Scribner Publishing during the 1930s.

programme.title: Out of Time, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Florida police chief is framed for murder and races against the clock to find the real killer.

programme.title: Be Cool, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mobster Chili Palmer ditches the movie business for the music industry when he decides to manage a singer in this sequel.

programme.title: Zero Days, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A look at cyberwarfare explores how a computer virus called Stuxnet, which was allegedly created by the United States and Israel to shut down an Iranian nuclear facility, has ushered in a new era of international conflict.

programme.title: The Show, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: A TV network desperate for ratings launches a reality show on which people who are considering suicide are offered the chance to do it live on-air. A struggling janitor signs up, hoping to help his family survive.

programme.title: The Captive, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: A father searches for his kidnapped daughter after new evidence suggests that she is still alive. Although years have passed since she disappeared, the revelation that shes being held in captivity offers hope for her safe return.

programme.title: Kingpin, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Seventeen years after a bad hustle left him with a mangled hand, ex-pro bowler Roy Munson (Woody Harrelson) finds his ticket back to the fast lane in a young Amish boy (Randy Quaid), whom he enters in a million-dollar winner-take-all bowling tournament in Reno. Bill Murray, Vanessa Angel, Chris Elliott, William Jordan, Richard Tyson, Lin Shaye.

credits.actor: The Artist Formerly Known as Docky

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: A large diamond becomes the common denominator for an interlocking network of lowlifes, thugs, gangsters and a bare-knuckle boxing champ.

programme.title: A Fish Called Wanda, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Hilarious comedy about a larcenous bunch who team up to steal a diamond collection, then try to double-cross each other for the loot.

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Con men, both working the Riviera, trample on each others turf; they make a bet that will force one of them to leave.

programme.title: Chaplin, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: The life and career of the screen legend as told to a fictional biographer.

programme.title: Beacon 23, (2023, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Returning to Beacon 23, the inhabitants are still trapped under Alephs watchful eye.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence, (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The minds of two cinematic geniuses meld in this visionary sci-fi epic directed by Steven Spielberg and based on a treatment by Stanley Kubrick. Haley Joel Osment is extraordinary as a robot programmed to have human emotions. After he is abandoned by his adoptive parents, he sets out to become a real boy.

programme.title: Wicker Park, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Thriller that shifts perspectives and skips around in time to tell the story of a mans obsessive search for his missing lover.

programme.title: The Visitor, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: After a series of tragedies including the death of his father-in-law, Robert and his wife Maia leave their home in London to move back to her childhood home. But when Robert discovers an old portrait in the attic of a man who is his spitting image, he goes down a rabbit hole to discover the identity of this mysterious doppelganger known only as the visitor. It isnt long until he realizes ? where the visitor goes, death follows.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1977, Musical)
programme.desc: A working-class young man from New York City is famous on the local disco scene, and has a complicated relationship with a fellow dancer who dreams of making it big.

programme.title: Cyrano, (2021, Romance)
programme.desc: Nobleman, military man, and poet Cyrano de Bergerac is secretly in love with Roxanne. However, his insecurity over his dwarf stature prevents him from professing his love, especially when Roxanne confesses that shes interested in Christian, a recruit. Elated that Roxanne would like a guy like him, Christian feels anxious about speaking to her. Cyrano agrees to ghostwrite love letters for him.

programme.title: Emma, (2020, Romance)
programme.desc: Handsome adaptation of Jane Austens classic about a rich young woman whose meddlesome attempts at matchmaking are disastrous.

programme.title: Hot Pursuit, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: A bumbling female police officer is assigned to protect a drug dealers widow from corrupt cops and criminals who want her dead. After realising theyve been set up, they go on the run and try to pass themselves off as a couple.

programme.title: Shes All That, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A popular high-schooler bets he can transform a nerd into the prom queen.
